head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Father Admits Fatally Shaking Son

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Queens: Father Admits Fatally Shaking Son

block.p: A Queens man pleaded guilty to manslaughter yesterday for shaking his 3-month-old son to death, District Attorney Richard A. Brown announced. In a statement, he said that Victor Fuentes, 20, of Onderdonk Avenue in Ridgewood, admitted that he shook his son, Victor Fuentes Jr., on March 16, 2004, to stop him from crying. Mr. Fuentes's sentence will be 14 years in prison.
